content:
ActorReentrancyMode ActorReentrancyMode Enum

In this Article

Edit

Specifies Reentrancy mode for actor method calls.

Syntax

Declaration

public enum ActorReentrancyModePublic Enum ActorReentrancyMode

Fields

Disallowed
Disallowed

Disallows actors to be reentrant. In this case if an actor sends a reentrant message to another actor an exception of type FabricException will be thrown.
LogicalCallContext
LogicalCallContext

Allows actors to be reentrant if they are in the same call context chain. This is the default option for actors.

Details

Namespace

Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Actors.Runtime

Assembly

Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Actors.dll
